full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 145 of 228 821 LC2VMAX4 Alessi - Direct VOIR DIRE EXAMINATION BY MR. PAGLIUCA: Q. Good afternoon, Mr. Alessi. A. Good afternoon, sir. Q. You left Mr. Epstein's employment in 2001; correct? A. 2002. Q. December of 2001; correct? A. No, December 2002. Q. Okay. And when you left -- THE COURT: You can take your mask off. MR. PAGLIUCA: Thank you, your Honor. It's becoming a habit wearing it. Q. When you left in 2002, you didn't have in your possession Government Exhibit 606, which is dated different dates, but beginning in February of 2005; is that correct? A. No. I -- I had it in my possession, a booklet with the dates. It didn't have dates when I was given to it. Q. Okay. But you left, you say, in 2002? A. That's correct. Q. So if something was made after 2002, you would not have had it; correct? A. Absolutely, no. Q. All right. Okay. And so whatever you had in 2002 was not Government Exhibit 606, which was created, at least by the date on it, SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012430

text_blocks.content: VOIR DIRE EXAMINATION BY MR. PAGLIUCA:

Q. Good afternoon, Mr. Alessi. A. Good afternoon, sir. Q. You left Mr. Epstein's employment in 2001; correct? A. 2002. Q. December of 2001; correct? A. No, December 2002. Q. Okay. And when you left -- THE COURT: You can take your mask off. MR. PAGLIUCA: Thank you, your Honor. It's becoming a habit wearing it. Q. When you left in 2002, you didn't have in your possession Government Exhibit 606, which is dated different dates, but beginning in February of 2005; is that correct? A. No. I -- I had it in my possession, a booklet with the dates. It didn't have dates when I was given to it. Q. Okay. But you left, you say, in 2002? A. That's correct. Q. So if something was made after 2002, you would not have had it; correct? A. Absolutely, no. Q. All right. Okay. And so whatever you had in 2002 was not Government Exhibit 606, which was created, at least by the date on it,
